stripe above and         1 below the braid  k2 p2 8 row in main color knit 1 row  knit 2 row in contrast color knit 2 row in black squares are the braid color and the white main color squares are the background color work chart i thought these black boxes would be an knit 2 row in main color knit 2 row in improvement over the xs from the smaller chart contrast color knit 3 row in main color then on the celtic know work hat but i m not work decreases as above sure still the pattern was free so it s not all bad right a very special thanks to fellow raveler justmichelle for making this chart and giving me permission to distribute it i used cascade 220 superwash but any worsted weight yarn will do i don t know about the main color but i only used 14-16 gms of contrast color i used size us 6 needles and got a gauge of 5 sts/inch because of the color work there isn t a whole lot of stretch so it s better to make it a little big the pattern repeat is 8 sts so add sts in multiples of 8 to the cast on number if you need to make it
